name: Mortal Kombat (itch) (campotech)
description:
MORTAL KOMBAT!!!!

It's been 30 years now since the original Mortal Kombat came to arcades everywhere. Featuring Bloody fatalities, 7 playable characters each with their own special moves, and exciting gameplay that defined a generation. This was also one of the games that started the ESRB System and that sure didn't stop them. Now I wanted to do this game for the 30th anniversary of this legendary arcade game. 

In this version it has 10 playable characters including Reptile, Goro, and Shang Tsung.

Original Arcade Music

New Fatalities but some are still the same.

New Survival and Team Mode

I grew up with Mortal Kombat in the 90's and it had magic and excitement. Even though I can't wait to do Mortal Kombat 2 because that is my favorite in the series.

I hope that I can bring you the excitement and thrills of this legendary game that started the Mortal Kombat Series.

Please Note that this is a M rated game because of the violence and gore so parental discretion is advised.
